alert.note: Alert for Boone; Delaware; Hamilton; Hancock; Hendricks; Henry; Madison; Marion; Montgomery; Randolph; Tipton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Madison, northern Hancock, Delaware, northwestern Randolph, northeastern Hendricks, northern Henry, northern Marion, Boone, Hamilton, southeastern Tipton and east central Montgomery Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Matthews to 6 miles northwest of Noblesville to 11 miles east of Crawfordsville. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Strong winds will occur as much as 10 to 15 minutes ahead of the arrival of the rain and storms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Noblesville around 520 PM EDT. Fishers and Lebanon around 530 PM EDT. Muncie around 535 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Brownsburg, Zionsville, Speedway and Winchester. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 116 and 144. Interstate 69 between mile markers 200 and 252. Interstate 74 between mile markers 38 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and east central Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Delaware; Hamilton; Hancock; Hendricks; Henry; Madison; Marion; Montgomery; Randolph; Tipton
